iati-activity.title: Tranforming lives through WASH, Boane District
iati-activity.description: Boane District, Mozambique: The project goal is "to improve the living conditions of 91,744 people in Boane District through increased access to equitable, inclusive and sustainable WASH services."
iati-activity.participating-org: Associaçao para o Desenvolvimento da Comunidade
iati-activity.activity-date: Date that project is due to end
Date that project started to the nearest quarter

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK

iati-activity.related-activity: Civil Society Water, Sanitation and Hygiene Fund
